channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16024] Revert HBASE-15406 from branch-1.3
item.description: As discussed in there, this is kind of controversial change and more thoughts are probably needed around it to get it right.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: It looks like I can't attach patch to original jira (not sure why - is it because Im not assignee, or because I'm missing from some ldap group, or some jira glitch), but here's the patch.

I was doing it via {{git revert }} yesterday, but I was not able to commit it due to a different issue.

I think this should stay (from HBASE-15608): 


-  @Deprecated

Otherwise looks good. Can you please run: 


mvn clean install -Pcompile-protobuf

to make sure that protobuf is recompiled junt in case.

Didn't know you were doing this (maybe I missed a jira, sorry, might be a dup then)

Yeah, compile protobuf ran fine and didn't change any files (didn't run full tests yet, waiting for precommut bot to vote on it as well)
Enis Soztutar restored Deprecated annotation in one place

-1 overall
